filters

Class UserInputFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
      • filters.UserInputFilter

  • public class UserInputFilter
extends javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
    A filter that modifies the text field while the user types during the typing test.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter

                    javax.swing.text.AttributeSet attrs)
             throws javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
        Updates the text field, user input model, and text box model as the user types.
        Overrides:
        replace in class javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
        Parameters:
        fb - FilterBypass that can be used to mutate Document
        offset - Location in Document
        length - Length of text to delete
        text - Text to insert, null indicates no text to insert
        attrs - AttributeSet indicating attributes of inserted text, null is legal.
        Throws:
        javax.swing.text.BadLocationException - the given insert position is not a valid position within the document

      • remove

        public void remove(javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter.FilterBypass fb,
                   int offset,
                   int length)
            throws javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
        Updates the text field and the user input model as the user removes text from the text field.
        Overrides:
        remove in class javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
        Parameters:
        fb - FilterBypass that can be used to mutate Document
        offset - the offset from the beginning >= 0
        length - the number of characters to remove >= 0
        Throws:
        javax.swing.text.BadLocationException - some portion of the removal range was not a valid part of the document. The location in the exception is the first bad position encountered.
